conversation.message:
Hi Company_C—thank you. On the two quick details:

1) Tools: strongest in SQL (writing/optimizing queries, building metrics tables) + Python (pandas) for analysis; dashboards in Looker/Tableau (and lightweight reporting in Sheets).

2) Example impact: In a prior ops role, I rebuilt our weekly pipeline/throughput KPI reporting by standardizing definitions, creating a SQL-based source-of-truth table, and shipping a Looker dashboard + weekly cadence. This reduced manual reporting time from ~6–8 hrs/week to <1 hr/week and improved on-time SLA performance by ~12% over the next quarter by making bottlenecks visible and driving clear owner/action tracking.

Given that, which specific track/team at Company_C (BizOps/Strategy & Ops, Growth Ops, Analytics, etc.) would be the closest fit for immediate needs? If you point me to the right opening, I’m happy to re-apply directly to that role.
